text: Niccayamaka sapa nattinarukku, avarkal vacittirunta itankalil or attatci iruntatu. (Atan) valappurattilum itappurattilum irantu colaikal iruntana"unkal iraivan alittulla akarattiliruntu puciyunkal; avanukku nanriyum celutti varunkal. (Atu manamulla) valamana nakaram; innum (avan) mannippalikkum iraivan" (enru avarkalukkuk kurappattatu)
